page.title: 09My Day,Mark,age 10.N.Silton
page.content: We have dinner at twelve o'clock which consists of two courses,usually meat and two vegetables and often steamed pudding and custard with a drink of water.After dinner we go out to play again and come in at 1 o'clock.We have English,History,Geography,Arts & Crafts,Music or Physical Education. Special teachers come in to teach art, music and P.E.We have another break at 2.40 p.m. and school closes at 3.30 p.m.My mum comes to collect us and we go home and change into play clothes. My brother and I call for Christopher and we may go and build our den or ride our bikes.We go in at 5 p.m. and have tea,usually salad.I go out again but have to be in by 8.30 when I watch television.We go to bed at 10.15 after having supper of a drink of coffee or orange and a piece of toast.
